welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.p1: Our clinic, located in the heart of Nicosia, the capital of Northern Cyprus, operates within the Elite Hospital and has been working tirelessly for years to help you achieve pregnancy. We are here to assist every individual who comes to us with the dream of becoming a parent — using science, a variety of techniques and methods, and the most modern, innovative, and cutting-edge infrastructure available.
welcome.p2: I took my first professional step in the field of IVF eight years ago in Wiesbaden, Germany. Since the very first day, practicing my profession within the framework of ethical principles has always been my top priority. I realized how sacred and meaningful my profession was the moment I performed my first embryo transfer and shared in my patient’s joy of pregnancy.
welcome.p3: When someone chooses you and places their trust in you, it comes with great responsibility and requires dedication. You embark on a meaningful and important journey together with your patient — you laugh together, you cry together. Your patient may be stressed; you are the one who must provide the best and most sincere comfort. Your patient may be anxious; you are the one who stands by them and understands them. When the day of the pregnancy test finally arrives, you are the one who shares in that immense excitement. You become a part of your patient’s most private hope and secret. That is why being sincere, honest, and transparent with your patient is so essential.
welcome.p4: At the end of the day, when mutual effort leads to beautiful outcomes — granting our patients the joy of becoming parents — the gratitude and prayers they offer each time they look at their child are truly priceless. Once you share in these feelings, you naturally find the best path for your patients to achieve pregnancy, and with mutual understanding and effort, you move step by step toward success. The answer to the question my patients have asked me for years — ‘How do you stay so positive and successful?’ — lies right here. We draw our energy from you, and we give it back to you.
welcome.p5: I can never thank enough each and every individual who has believed in us, trusted us, and walked this journey by our side. If you haven’t met us yet and are ready to embark on your IVF journey, come take this step with us. Let’s take you one step closer to becoming a family.
welcome.signatureTitle: Director of Ayda IVF Team & Head of Embryology Laboratory

slides.title: Let’s Give the Most Beautiful Gift
slides.subtitle: The Gift of Life

tm.title: Our Treatment Methods
tm.p1: Before visiting the Ayda IVF Team, take a look at our carefully prepared treatment methods designed to help you learn more about your options.
tm.p2: After reviewing our treatments, remember that we are just one call away to answer all your questions. We look forward to meeting you and helping you hold your healthy baby soon.

address.title: Our Address
address.text: Şehit Erdoğan Yıldız Cd. No:5 Kızılay, Nicosia, North Cyprus (TRNC)

aboutCyprus.title: About Cyprus Island
aboutCyprus.description1: Cyprus island has two different countries governed by two different states. The island of Cyprus, divided into North and South, has a border crossing between countries.
aboutCyprus.description2: Northern Cyprus is a Turkish country and its currency is Turkish Lira. Southern Cyprus is a European country and its currency is Euro.

northCyprus.title: North Cyprus
northCyprus.description1: Cyprus is an island in the Mediterranean, neighboring Syria, Lebanon, Israel, Egypt, Greece and Turkey.
northCyprus.description2: TRNC is located in the northern part of Cyprus island, and our IVF hospital is located in Nicosia, the capital of North Cyprus (TRNC).
northCyprus.description3: Cyprus has a typical Mediterranean climate. It has a long summer season lasting from April to approximately October. During these periods, the temperature is usually around 22-38 °C. There is a winter period that generally extends from November to the end of May. In winter, the temperature is usually around 10-18 °C.

ourCare.title: We thought of every detail for you!
ourCare.description1: We tried to think of every detail to ensure that you receive treatment in a stress-free environment when coming for your IVF treatment.
ourCare.description2: Since we believe that a stress-free environment will positively affect your IVF treatment, we have agreements with hotels and houses suitable for every budget where you can stay. Thus, you will not need to think about where to stay when you come for treatment.
ourCare.description3: We also have transportation at affordable prices for you to be picked up from the airport to your hotel and from your accommodation to our clinic.
ourCare.description4: We hope to provide you with a stress-free, peaceful and comfortable hospitality throughout your treatment.

byAir.title: Coming to North Cyprus by Air
byAir.subtitle: There are 2 ways to come to North Cyprus by air;

ercan.title: 1. Ercan Airport
ercan.description1: You can fly to Ercan Airport located in Nicosia, the capital of North Cyprus.
ercan.description2: Ercan airport is the only active airport in North Cyprus. Our hospital is approximately 20 minutes drive from Ercan airport by taxi.
ercan.description3: The airlines that have the most active flights to Ercan airport from all over the world are 'Turkish Airlines' and 'Pegasus Airlines'.
ercan.description4: There is no visa requirement for Turkish and European citizens on flights to Ercan airlines. You can easily enter North Cyprus with your ID or Passport.
ercan.description5: Arrival to Ercan airport is only via a transit flight connected to Turkey (usually Istanbul).

south.title: 2. South Cyprus Airports
south.description: It is also possible to cross to North Cyprus by coming to one of the airports located in the South of Cyprus (Greek Cypriot Administration of South Cyprus). You must be a European Union citizen to travel to South Cyprus.
south.airportsTitle: Airports in the South of Cyprus;

larnaca.title: Larnaca Airport
larnaca.description: It is located in the city of Larnaca in South Cyprus. The taxi distance to our clinic is approximately 1 hour.

paphos.title: Paphos Airport
paphos.description: It is located in the city of Paphos in South Cyprus. The taxi distance to our clinic is approximately 2 hours.

bySea.title: Coming to North Cyprus by Sea
bySea.description1: You can also reach Cyprus from Turkey by ferry. There are ferry services from Mersin, Taşucu or Alanya Ports to North Cyprus. Please do not forget that you need to be at the port two hours before the ferry departure time and reserve your tickets in advance in case they sell out.
bySea.description2: Turkish citizens do not need a visa or passport to travel to North Cyprus. You can stay in Cyprus for a maximum of 3 months with your ID card.
bySea.description3: Don't forget to activate your mobile phone line for international use in Cyprus, depending on the operator you use!

contact.description: You can get detailed information about Transportation and Accommodation from your coordinator.

shipping.question: When will my order arrive?
shipping.answer: Your order will be shipped within 1-3 business days. Delivery time may vary depending on your location.

returns.question: How does the return process work?
returns.answer: You can request a return within 14 days of receiving your item. Please check our Return Policy page for details.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, bank transfer, and cash on delivery.

account.question: Do I need to create an account?
account.answer: No, you can order as a guest; however, having an account makes it easier to track your orders.
